meanings.definition: A compound containing the hydroperoxide group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the hydroperoxides in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Organic chemistry deals with various hydroperoxides.
meanings.sent3: The hydroperoxides decided to throw a party in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: The hydroperoxides were like tiny time bombs waiting to explode.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the hydroperoxides shimmered like tiny jewels.

meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing the hydroperoxide functional group.
meanings.sent1: Researchers are exploring the properties of hydroperoxides.
meanings.sent2: The textbook explained the synthesis of hydroperoxides.
meanings.sent3: The hydroperoxides in the beaker seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: In the chemical reaction, the hydroperoxides danced and changed forms.
meanings.sent5: The smell of hydroperoxides filled the lab, reminding everyone of fresh rain.
